title: Sidebar Customization
description: A guide to modifying the sidebar navigation in your documentation template.

body.raw:
# Sidebar Customization The sidebar navigation in this documentation template is defined in the `config/sidebar.tsx` file. Developers can easily modify the sidebar structure by adding, updating, or removing items in this configuration. ## Folder Structure The sidebar configuration is stored in the `config` directory:

sidebar.tsx

introduction.mdx

installation.mdx

theme.mdx

search-bar.mdx

Sidebar.tsx

 ## Editing Sidebar Navigation To customize the sidebar, open `config/sidebar.tsx` and modify the `sidebarNav` array. ### Sidebar Structure Each sidebar item follows this structure: ```tsx { title: string; // Display title icon?: JSX.Element; // Optional icon component href?: string; // Optional link if there are no sub-pages pages?: { title: string; // Sub-page title href: string; // Sub-page link }[]; } ``` ### Adding a New Sidebar Section If you want to add a new section, append an object to the `sidebarNav` array: ```tsx { title: "New Section", icon: , // Use any icon pages: [ { title: "New Page", href: "/docs/new-section/new-page", } ] } ``` ### Adding a Single Page Without Sub-Pages To add a single page (without dropdown sub-pages): ```tsx { title: "Standalone Page", icon: , href: "/docs/standalone-page", pages: [] // Keep empty } ``` ### Removing an Existing Section Simply remove the corresponding object from the `sidebarNav` array. ### Updating an Existing Section Modify the `title`, `href`, or `pages` array for an existing item. ## Where is the Sidebar Rendered? The sidebar is typically used inside a `Sidebar.tsx` component inside the `components` directory. Ensure that this component correctly maps over the `sidebarNav` array and renders it dynamically. ## Summary - The sidebar structure is defined in `config/sidebar.tsx`. - Each section contains a `title`, optional `icon`, and `pages` array. - To modify the sidebar, update the `sidebarNav` array. - Changes are automatically reflected in the sidebar component. - This is a simple modification that can be done quickly. This guide should help developers easily navigate and modify the sidebar for their documentation.
